official_title: Using Behavioral Economics and Implementation Science to Advance the Use of Genomic Medicine Utilizing an EHR Infrastructure Across a Diverse Health System
inclusion_criteria:
* 18 years of age or older
* diagnosed with one of the study conditions
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Under 18 years of age
* not diagnosed with one of the study conditions
